targets.expr: max(container_memory_working_set_bytes{container_label_network="$network", hostname="$hostname", name=~"$container", name!="", image!=""}) by (name) / max(container_spec_memory_limit_bytes{container_label_network=~"$network", hostname="$hostname", name=~"$container", name!="", image!=""}) by (name) * 100

max(container_memory_working_set_bytes{container_label_network="$network", hostname="$hostname", name=~"$container", name!="", image!=""}) by (name) / max(container_spec_memory_limit_bytes{container_label_network=~"$network", hostname="$hostname", name=~"$container", name!="", image!=""}) by (name) * 100
